title: So I just got qualified for PBE tester...
body: So I just got an email about me getting PBE tester, and now that i have it all set up, i can't play because the file is downloading super slow at like 150 kbps when there is 5 gigabytes of stuff that needs to be downloaded

replies.body: You're basically reinstalling the whole game in a different location to make sure that there's no cross-talk. It probably will take a while even at top speed.

Have you run into any errors while trying to download PBE other than the slow download speed? If not, it's best to let the installer do its thing. We could try to get you a better connection by using an ethernet cable until you've finished the download, or you could take a look through our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as well.

If you do run into any errors while downloading, feel free to shoot that error my way and I'll do my best to help!
